barium.config.tooltip.aggressiveFaceCull: Attempts to remove more hidden faces (e.g., leaves, fluids) for rendering. May cause minor visual artifacts.
barium.config.tooltip.optimizeFluidRende: Enables specialized optimizations for fluid rendering, reducing overdraw for internal fluid faces.
barium.config.tooltip.chunkBuilderThread: Sets the number of threads used for chunk re-meshing. Higher values may improve chunk loading but increase CPU usage.
barium.config.tooltip.enableQuadSorting: Enables experimental quad sorting to reduce draw calls within chunks. May have unpredictable visual effects or crashes if not fully implemented.
